'''Chalactan'''
The Chalactans were a species of Humans native to [[Chalacta]]. There were at least four prominent Chalactan Force-sensitives during the waning years of the Galactic Republic: Jedi High Councilor [[Depa Billaba]] who fell to the dark side, Jedi Master Simms, Jedi Knight [[Sar Labooda]], and Padawan [[Klossi Anno]]. Circa 22 BBY, the Chalactans were represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator [[Yudrish Sedran]], who opposed the Military Creation Act after consulting the wisdom of the Chalactan Temple of Illumination. Chalactans were famous for their spiritual order, the Chalactan Adepts.

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
